verses.verse: וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El So all Israel הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <S%H3187><s%> hit-yach-Su, were reckoned by genealogies וְהִנָּ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Nam and behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim, and behold they [were] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer in the book מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וִיהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah and Judah הָגְל֥וּ <S%H1540><s%> ha-ge-Lu [who] were carried away לְבָבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> le-va-Vel to Babylon בְּמַעֲלָֽם׃ <S%H4604><s%> be-ma-'a-Lam. for their transgression ס sa-Mek

וְהַיּוֹשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> ve-hai-yo-she-Vim inhabitants הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> ha-Ri-sho-Nim, Now the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּאֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <S%H272><s%> ba-'a-chuz-za-Tam that [dwelt] in their possessions בְּעָרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-rei-Hem; in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El [were] the Israelites הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim Levites וְהַנְּתִינִֽים׃ <S%H5411><s%> ve-han-ne-ti-Nim. and the Nethinims

וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim And in Jerusalem יָשְׁב֔וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu, dwelt מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- Some בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- Some בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- Some בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> u-me-nash-Sheh. and Manasseh

עוּתַ֨י <S%H5793><s%> 'u-Tai Uthai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּיה֤וּד <S%H5989><s%> 'am-mi-Hud of Ammihud בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עָמְרִי֙ <S%H6018><s%> 'a-me-Ri of Omri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אִמְרִ֣י <S%H566><s%> 'im-Ri of Imri בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son; בָּנִימִן־ ba-ni-min- כבָּנִ֔י ba-Ni, ק; מִן־ <S%H1144><s%> min- Benjamin בְּנֵי־ <S%H1137><s%> be-nei- of Bani פֶ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Fe-retz of Pharez קבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- From הַשִּׁ֣ילוֹנִ֔י <S%H7888><s%> hash-Shi-lo-Ni, And of the Shilonites עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <S%H6222><s%> 'a-sa-Yah Asaiah הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor the firstborn וּבָנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav. and his sons

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- and of בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- And of the sons זֶ֖רַח <S%H2226><s%> Ze-rach of Zerah יְעוּאֵ֑ל <S%H3262><s%> ye-'u-'El; Jeuel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem and their brethren שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <S%H8673><s%> ve-tish-'Im. and ninety

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- From בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And of the sons בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin סַלּוּא֙ <S%H5543><s%> sal-Lu Sallu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam, of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הוֹדַוְיָ֖ה <S%H1938><s%> ho-dav-Yah of Hodaviah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַסְּנֻאָֽה׃ <S%H5574><s%> has-se-nu-'Ah. of Hasenuah

וְיִבְנְיָה֙ <S%H2997><s%> ve-yiv-ne-Yah And Ibneiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham, of Jeroham וְאֵלָ֥ה <S%H425><s%> ve-'e-Lah and Elah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עֻזִּ֖י <S%H5813><s%> 'uz-Zi of Uzzi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מִכְרִ֑י <S%H4381><s%> mich-Ri; of Michri וּמְשֻׁלָּם֙ <S%H4918><s%> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah, of Shephathiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רְעוּאֵ֖ל <S%H7467><s%> re-'u-'El of Reuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִבְנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H2998><s%> yiv-ni-Yah. of Ibnijah

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem And their brethren לְתֹ֣לְדוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8435><s%> le-To-le-do-Tam, according to their generations תְּשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> te-Sha' nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty וְשִׁשָּׁ֑ה <S%H8337><s%> ve-shish-Shah; and six כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim, he רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei [were] chief אָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of the fathers לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit in the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Hem. of their fathers ס sa-Mek

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim; And of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H3048><s%> ye-da'-Yah Jedaiah וִיהוֹיָרִ֖יב <S%H3080><s%> vi-ho-ya-Riv and Jehoiarib וְיָכִֽין׃ <S%H3199><s%> ve-ya-Chin. and Jachin

וַעֲזַרְיָ֨ה <S%H5838><s%> va-'a-zar-Yah And Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Yah of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צָד֗וֹק <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok, of Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <S%H4812><s%> me-ra-yOt of Meraioth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <S%H285><s%> 'a-chi-Tuv, of Ahitub נְגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> ne-Gid the ruler בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God ס sa-Mek

וַעֲדָיָה֙ <S%H5718><s%> va-'a-da-Yah And Adaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham, of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <S%H6583><s%> pash-Chur of Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מַלְכִּיָּ֑ה <S%H4441><s%> mal-ki-Yah; of Malchijah וּמַעְשַׂ֨י <S%H4640><s%> u-ma'-Sai and Maasiai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עֲדִיאֵ֧ל <S%H5717><s%> 'a-di-'El of Adiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יַחְזֵ֛רָה <S%H3170><s%> yach-Ze-rah of Jahzerah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשִׁלֵּמִ֖ית <S%H4921><s%> me-shil-le-Mit of Meshillemith בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <S%H564><s%> 'im-Mer. of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem, And their brethren רָאשִׁים֙ <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim heads לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam, of their fathers אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> u-she-Va' and seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֑ים <S%H8346><s%> ve-shish-Shim; and threescore גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bo-rei men חֵ֔יל <S%H2428><s%> Cheil, very able מְלֶ֖אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet for the work עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> a-vo-Dat of the service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וּמִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim; And of the Levites שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <S%H2815><s%> chash-Shuv of Hasshub בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <S%H5840><s%> 'az-ri-Kam of Azrikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Yah of Hashabiah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri. of Merari

וּבַקְבַּקַּ֥ר <S%H1230><s%> u-vak-bak-Kar And Bakbakkar חֶ֖רֶשׁ <S%H2792><s%> Che-resh Heresh וְגָלָ֑ל <S%H1559><s%> ve-ga-Lal; and Galal וּמַתַּנְיָה֙ <S%H4983><s%> u-mat-tan-Yah and Mattaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מִיכָ֔א <S%H4316><s%> mi-Cha, of Micah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> zich-Ri of Zichri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf. of Asaph

וְעֹבַדְיָה֙ <S%H5662><s%> ve-'oad-Yah And Obadiah בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah, of Shemaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גָּלָ֖ל <S%H1559><s%> ga-Lal of Galal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְדוּת֑וּן <S%H3038><s%> ye-du-Tun; of Jeduthun וּבֶרֶכְיָ֤ה <S%H1296><s%> u-ve-rech-Yah and Berechiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אָסָא֙ <S%H609><s%> 'a-Sa of Asa בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <S%H511><s%> 'el-ka-Nah, of Elkanah הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּחַצְרֵ֥י <S%H2691><s%> be-chatz-Rei in the villages נְטוֹפָתִֽי׃ <S%H5200><s%> ne-to-fa-Ti. of the Netophathites

וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִים֙ <S%H7778><s%> ve-hash-sho-'a-Rim And the porters שַׁלּ֣וּם <S%H7967><s%> shal-Lum [were] Shallum וְעַקּ֔וּב <S%H6126><s%> ve-'ak-Kuv, and Akkub וְטַלְמֹ֖ן <S%H2929><s%> ve-tal-Mon and Talmon וַאֲחִימָ֑ן <S%H289><s%> va-'a-chi-Man; and Ahiman וַאֲחִיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chi-Hem and their brethren שַׁלּ֖וּם <S%H7967><s%> shal-Lum Shallum הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh. [was] the chief

וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- until הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah, now בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> be-Sha-'ar gate הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech Who hitherto [waited] in the king's מִזְרָ֑חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah; eastward הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <S%H7778><s%> hash-Sho-'a-Rim, they [were] porters לְמַחֲנ֖וֹת <S%H4264><s%> le-ma-cha-Not in the companies בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi. of Levi

וְשַׁלּ֣וּם <S%H7967><s%> ve-shal-Lum And Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son ק֠וֹרֵא <S%H6981><s%> Ko-re of Kore בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶבְיָסָ֨ף <S%H43><s%> 'ev-ya-Saf of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son קֹ֜רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah וְֽאֶחָ֧יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- of the house אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv of his father הַקָּרְחִ֗ים <S%H7145><s%> hak-ka-re-Chim, the Korahites עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet [were] over the work הָעֲבוֹדָ֔ה <S%H5656><s%> ha-'a-vo-Dah, of the service שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei keepers הַסִּפִּ֖ים <S%H5592><s%> has-sip-Pim of the gates לָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> la-'O-hel; of the tabernacle וַאֲבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-tei-Hem and their fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- had been over מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh [being] over the host יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei [were] keepers הַמָּבֽוֹא׃ <S%H3996><s%> ham-ma-Vo. of the entry

וּלְאָצֵל֮ <S%H682><s%> u-le-'a-Tzel And Azel שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah had six בָנִים֒ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim sons וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh are these שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> she-mo-Tam, whose names עַזְרִיקָ֥ם׀ <S%H5840><s%> 'az-ri-Kam [are] these Azrikam בֹּ֙כְרוּ֙ <S%H1074><s%> bo-che-ru Bocheru וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> ve-yish-ma-'El and Ishmael וּשְׁעַרְיָ֔ה <S%H8187><s%> u-she-'ar-Yah, and Sheariah וְעֹבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H5662><s%> ve-'oad-Yah and Obadiah וְחָנָ֑ן <S%H2605><s%> ve-cha-Nan; and Hanan אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei these [were] the sons אָצַֽל׃ <S%H682><s%> 'a-Tzal. of Azel פ Peh
